summary: 2ndShift production audit reveals critical role separation working correctly, but password reset flow broken (404), homepage role switching doesn't navigate to dedicated pages, and missing commission display verification. Core functionality works but UX friction points exist that could impact conversion.

issues.title: Password Reset Link Returns 404 - Broken Authentication Recovery
steps: Click 'Forgot?' link next to Password field
issues.expected: Password reset page loads or redirects to functional reset flow
issues.actual: 404 Not Found - /forgot-password route does not exist
issues.suggestion: Create app/(auth)/forgot-password/page.tsx or redirect to existing reset flow. This is a conversion blocker - users cannot recover accounts.
issues.risk: conversion risk - users locked out of accounts cannot recover

issues.title: Homepage Role CTAs Have href But onClick May Interfere With Navigation
issues.path: / → Click 'I want to work' or 'I want to hire'
steps: Observe if URL changes to /work?role=worker or stays at /
Check if content changes dynamically without navigation
issues.expected: CTAs should navigate to /work?role=worker or /clients?role=client with full page navigation and URL change
issues.actual: CTAs have proper href attributes but onClick handlers update role context. Need to verify if navigation actually occurs or if onClick preventsDefault() is blocking it.
issues.suggestion: Verify navigation works correctly. If onClick preventsDefault(), remove it or ensure navigation happens. Test: clicking CTA should change URL, browser back button should work, bookmarking should work.
issues.risk: conversion risk - if navigation doesn't work, breaks browser history, SEO impact, user expectations

issues.title: Category Pages Missing Breadcrumbs
issues.expected: Breadcrumb like 'Home / Category / DevOps' with clickable Home link
issues.risk: UX risk - users lose navigation context, harder to return home

issues.title: Workers Page Shows Low-Value Categories Contradicting High-Value Positioning
issues.expected: Only high-value categories (DevOps, Cloud, Networking, Security, AI, Data, SRE, DB, Programming) should appear
issues.actual: Filter shows 'Design' and 'Mobile' which contradict the high-value IT microtask positioning
issues.suggestion: Remove 'Design' and 'Mobile' from Skill Categories filter on /workers page. Align with homepage messaging that explicitly lists only 9 high-value categories.
issues.risk: product-market fit risk - confuses positioning, dilutes brand message

issues.title: Commission Display Present on Worker Page But Missing on Homepage Cards
issues.path: Job cards on homepage vs /work?role=worker page
steps: Navigate to homepage, check microtask cards
issues.expected: Commission should be consistently displayed on all job cards across all pages
issues.actual: Worker page (/work?role=worker) shows 'Commission: 8-18% based on complexity' on job cards. Homepage cards show only 'From ₹X,000' without commission. Inconsistent display may confuse users.
issues.suggestion: Add commission display to homepage job cards to match worker page format: 'Commission: 8-18% based on complexity' or 'Platform fee: X%'. Ensure consistency across all job listing pages.
issues.risk: UX risk - inconsistent information display reduces trust, users may be confused by different formats

issues.title: Homepage Hero CTAs Spacing Needs Verification
steps: Inspect hero CTAs 'I want to work' and 'I want to hire'
issues.expected: CTAs should have >= 16px gap (preferably 24px) for visual separation
issues.actual: CTAs visible and distinct but exact spacing needs CSS verification
issues.suggestion: Verify CSS gap property: .hero-ctas { gap: 24px; } or margin between buttons >= 16px. Ensure mobile stacking maintains spacing.
issues.risk: UX risk - insufficient spacing reduces visual hierarchy and clickability

issues.title: Console Errors - Network 404 for Forgot Password
issues.suggestion: Fix P0-001 (create forgot-password route) will resolve this
issues.risk: performance/error risk - 404s logged, impacts error monitoring

quickWins.title: Fix Password Reset 404 - Create Forgot Password Page
quickWins.action: Create app/(auth)/forgot-password/page.tsx with email input form that calls password reset API. Connect to Supabase auth.resetPasswordForEmail() or custom API endpoint. Estimated 4-6 hours.
quickWins.impact: High - Unblocks account recovery, critical for user retention. Currently users cannot recover locked accounts.

quickWins.title: Verify Homepage CTA Navigation - Test and Fix if Needed
quickWins.action: Test homepage CTAs: Click 'I want to work' and verify URL changes to /work?role=worker. If onClick preventsDefault() is blocking navigation, remove it or ensure navigation happens. Estimated 2-3 hours.
quickWins.impact: High - Ensures browser history, deep linking, SEO work correctly. Critical for user expectations.

quickWins.title: Add Commission Display to Homepage Job Cards for Consistency
quickWins.action: Update homepage job card component to include commission display matching worker page format: 'Commission: 8-18% based on complexity'. Ensure consistent information across all pages. Estimated 2 hours.
quickWins.impact: Medium - Improves transparency, builds trust, consistent UX across pages
